title: (Lesbiangay Comedy) Lebbigt Vatten [It's in the Water SWESUBS
description:
SVENSKA:
It&#039;s in the Water ÃƒÂ¤r en riktigt trevlig gay feel-good-komedi. Egentligen betyder titeln &#039;Det ligger i luften&#039; men filmen handlar om vatten sÃƒÂ¥ jag fick hitta pÃƒÂ¥ en annan titel pÃƒÂ¥ svenska.

FÃƒÂ¶r en gÃƒÂ¥ngs skull laddar jag alltsÃƒÂ¥ upp en lesbofilm som ocksÃƒÂ¥ kan avnjutas av killar som ÃƒÂ¤r gay. Jag har ÃƒÂ¶versatt den och bakat in texten i filen. Har du en DivX-certifierad dvd-spelare bÃƒÂ¶r texten synas utan problem. Tryck bara pÃƒÂ¥ Subtitleknappen pÃƒÂ¥ fjÃƒÂ¤rren fÃƒÂ¶r att kalla fram eller ta bort texterna. PÃƒÂ¥ exempelvis Pioneerspelare hamnar texten vÃƒÂ¤ldigt hÃƒÂ¶gt i bild, mer lagom lÃƒÂ¥gt i till exempel Yamahaspelare. Ni kan ocksÃƒÂ¥ spela den i datorn och eventuellt ladda bifogade soft-textfil (Lebbigt.Vatten.srt) istÃƒÂ¤llet om ni vill det. DÃƒÂ¥ kan ni sjÃƒÂ¤lva styra textplaceringen om ni vill ha texten.

Trots att jag slitit med ÃƒÂ¶versÃƒÂ¤ttningen i fyra dagar skrattar och grÃƒÂ¥ter jag fortfarande lika mycket pÃƒÂ¥ samma stÃƒÂ¤llen i filmen. Jag hoppas att nÃƒÂ¥gra av er gillar den lika mycket.

ENGLISH:
To remove the Swedish subs, just press the subtitle button on your dvd remote. If you do not use a DivX-certified player, chances are you won&#039;t ever see them. The subs are for Swedes, since the film has not yet been released in Swedish. The original U.K. dvd was released back in 2002.

If you have seen the old black-and-white cult movie &#039;Freaks&#039; (perhaps from the fifties?), you get an idea of what inspired this film. In Freaks, all the disabled and handicapped people that worked at the freak shows were fine human beings, while the &#039;normal&#039; healthy and &#039;beautiful&#039; characters were very unpleasant people. Here, in the Texan-right-wing-conservative-right-to-bear-arms-land of the town of Azalea Springs, many of the characters in the film are lesbians or gay men (gay is not okay there!). They tend to be the pleasant characters, while the straight people often are not so nice, with a few wonderful exceptions. That aside, all the straight roles are also extremely lovely to watch, they&#039;re such wonderful characters, so nobody should blame me for being militant. I&#039;m more on the sweet side, really.

Enjoy!
/Fredrika2
